value:
Outer beauty comes with advantages.
But inner beauty is more important,
don't you think?

Before the academy I was a member
of the Mittelfrank Opera troupe. Yes,
for a time, I was a songstress.

See Ingrid there, splashing around in
her swimsuit? She looks so carefree.
I'm not sure I can resist...

If only Professor Manuela were here.
I'm sure she'd love the opportunity to
flaunt some summer fashions.

What is summer for, if not being a
little adventurous?

Warm summer greetings from your
friend $Nf.$k$pHm... I'm not sure what I'm supposed
to do now. I can sing, if you like?
I'm always striving for greater things.
I need to rest my voice...

Dorothea Arnault, at your service.
I'm a member of the Black Eagles
at Garreg Mach Monastery.

Blue waters, cool breezes. What a
wonderful summer vacation this has
been...gawkers notwithstanding.$k$pOh, don't get me wrong. I have no
problem with the way people look at
me. Quite the opposite, in fact.$k$pIn Fódlan, I have no title, no wealth.
No Crest. Everything I got, I got by
using the tools at my disposal.$k$pMy voice, my wit, and yes, my beauty.
These are all crucial weapons in my
battle for survival.$k$pSo, people ogling me in my swimsuit,
their hearts going pitter-patter?
That's exactly how I want them.
Like what you see? It's rude to stare, you know.
Swimming works up an appetite. What do you say we bring some sandwiches next time?
Ooh! Cold! Oh, you're gonna get it!
I wish Manuela could be here to see all this. Maybe someday...
Would you be a dear and help me lotion up my back?
